title: Khroma Whip Lash Health Mascara from Kim, Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian
features: This high performance beauty by Khroma belies its hidden health benefits.
description: Wouldn't it be nice to know that each day your mascara contained ingredients for enhancing lash health over time in addition to providing immediately noticeable thicker, longer and darker lashes? This high performance beauty belies its hidden health benefits. Whip your lashes into the best shape ever - Buildable, long wearing formula lets you decide how far to go- natural look or va va voom...Create your own lash masterpiece without clumping, flaking, or smudging.
